====== Tabli - Env Module  ======


===== About =====
The ''env'' [[docs:tabli:module|module]] manages the tabli environment and in particular the [[docs:conf:env|global attributes]] of [[docs:tabli:tabli|tabli]].

===== Commands =====

^ Actions ^ Description ^
| [[list|list]] | Show in a list format all [[docs:conf:env|global attributes]] |
| [[delete|delete]] | Delete a [[docs:conf:env|global attribute]] in the [[:docs:conf:vault|conf vault]] |
| [[set|set]] | Set a [[docs:conf:env|global attribute]] in the [[:docs:conf:vault|conf vault]] |
| ''diagnostic''  | Print environment diagnostic information |

===== Syntax =====

<unit>
<code bash>
tabli env -h
</code>
<console>

Tabli env
=========

Management and configuration of the tabli execution environment



Syntax
------


    tabli env <command> [-h,--help]


where:


  Commands:

    delete        Delete a global attribute

    diagnostic    Print env diagnostic information

    list          List the global attributes

    set           Set a global attribute


  Option:

    -h,--help     Print this help

</console>
</unit>
